prompts.name: brief_security_focus
prompts.description: Security analysis with focus on common vulnerabilities
prompts.template:
üîí SECURITY ANALYSIS for commit {commit_hash}:

Commit: {message}
Files: {files_changed} | Lines: +{insertions}/-{deletions}

Analyze for OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities:
- A01 Broken Access Control
- A02 Cryptographic Failures  
- A03 Injection
- A04 Insecure Design
- A05 Security Misconfiguration
- A06 Vulnerable Components
- A07 Authentication Failures
- A08 Software Integrity Failures
- A09 Security Logging Failures
- A10 Server-Side Request Forgery

Provide one-line security assessment with risk level (LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH).

prompts.name: brief_performance_focus
prompts.description: Performance analysis with focus on common bottlenecks
prompts.template:
‚ö° PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS for commit {commit_hash}:

Commit: {message}
Files: {files_changed} | Lines: +{insertions}/-{deletions}

Analyze for performance impact:
- Database query optimization
- Algorithm complexity (O notation)
- Memory allocation patterns
- Network I/O efficiency
- Caching strategies
- Async/await usage
- Loop optimizations
- Resource cleanup

Provide one-line performance assessment with impact level (POSITIVE/NEUTRAL/NEGATIVE).

prompts.name: deep_architecture_review
prompts.template:
üèóÔ∏è ARCHITECTURAL REVIEW for commit {commit_hash}:

Commit: {message}
Author: {author}
Date: {date}
Files: {files_changed} | Lines: +{insertions}/-{deletions}

Architectural Analysis Framework:
1. SOLID Principles compliance
2. Design patterns usage/violations
3. Dependency injection and inversion
4. Separation of concerns
5. API design consistency
6. Data flow architecture
7. Scalability implications
8. Maintainability impact
9. Technical debt introduction/reduction
10. System boundaries and abstractions

Return JSON:
{{
  "summary": "Architectural impact summary",
  "details": "Detailed architectural analysis",
  "risks": ["architectural risk 1", "architectural risk 2"],
  "recommendations": ["improvement 1", "improvement 2"],
  "solid_score": "1-10 SOLID principles adherence",
  "patterns": ["pattern1 used", "pattern2 violated"],
  "technical_debt": "INCREASED/DECREASED/NEUTRAL"
}}

prompts.name: deep_security_pentest
prompts.template:
üïµÔ∏è PENETRATION TEST ANALYSIS for commit {commit_hash}:

Commit: {message}

Date: {date}

Pentest-focused security analysis:
